Name: Cyphers Game VR
About the game: Take on the role of authentic soldiers of the 1920 Polish-Bolshevik War. Activate communication devices from 100 years ago. See what Bolshevik armored trains looked like up close. 'Cyphers Game' is a cross-platform educational project prepared as a short point and click game consisting of four missions. It describes the course of the Polish-Bolshevik war and the influence of Polish cryptology on its victorious finale. VR version of the recently published game 'Cyphers Game'.
